rows.label: qev091301_MSG0003
rows.name: ...Hmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_JNK0010
rows.name: Nudge

rows.label: qev091301_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Phog that this is a good time to start talking.

rows.label: qev091301_JNK0020
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev091301_SEL0021
rows.name: Stand still and let Phog notice you.

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0004
rows.name: ...Talking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0005
rows.name: Um, okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0006
rows.name: Well, I feel like I'm finally getting the hang of life on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0007
rows.name:
The other day, I... Wait, you look like I'm babbling.
Why are you even here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0008
rows.name: Oh! I get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0008_02
rows.name: You must have seen that posting on Mission Control, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0009
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0010
rows.name: Oh! Hello there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0010_02
rows.name: You must have seen that posting on Mission Control, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0011
rows.name: My apologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0012
rows.name: It's nice to meet you. I'm Phog Christoph.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'm a little surprised, actually.
I didn't think anyone would accept my request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0014
rows.name: This is the best thing that's happened to me all month.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_JNK0030
rows.name: Urge

rows.label: qev091301_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Phog to make his point.

rows.label: qev091301_JNK0040
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev091301_SEL0041
rows.name: Let Phog sort his thoughts.

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yes, of course. Time is money, as they say.
I'll get straight to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0016
rows.name: ...Okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0017
rows.name: ...Okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0018
rows.name:
Thanks for letting me take this at my own pace.
You're very patient.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0019
rows.name:
I've finally got my thoughts together.
Let me explain the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Basically, some of the data probes installed by
the Pathfinders have been acting up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0021
rows.name: Trouble is, they've got their hands full with installation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0022
rows.name:
So now it falls to the Prospectors.
Er, and me, specifically.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0023
rows.name:
We rely on data from those probes
when gathering ore and other resources.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0024
rows.name:
And now we're being asked to investigate
the cause of the malfunction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Frankly, I think it's ridiculous that we should
be given such a dangerous job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Besides, field investigation and combat
aren't exactly my forte...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_JNK0050
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev091301_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you should head out there at once.

rows.label: qev091301_JNK0060
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: qev091301_SEL0061
rows.name:
Tell Phog that he should try it himself
before relying on others.

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0027
rows.name:
Already? Wow, that was fast.
I wish I could be that decisive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0028
rows.name: But you're right. We should go have a look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0029
rows.name: Oh, I suppose I should mention the location, huh? Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0031
rows.name:
We need to check out a few different probes,
so might as well start with the closest one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0032
rows.name:
A valid point, but this will go much smoother if
someone with more experience takes the lead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0033
rows.name: Apologies if that sounds condescending.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0034
rows.name: Mostly I'm just scared to go alone. So please come?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0036
rows.name:
We need to check out a few different probes,
so might as well start with the closest one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0037
rows.name: ...Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0038
rows.name:
If we can resolve the issue,
the Prospectors can get back to work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0039
rows.name: Let's do it for New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091301_MSG0042
rows.name: They're in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]
